name: In the Matter of Steven J. FISHGOLD

parties: In the Matter of Steven J. FISHGOLD.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
AND NOW, this 20th day of March, 1997, Steven J. Fish-gold having been suspended from the practice of law in the United States Bankruptcy Court for the Eastern District of Pennsylvania by Order of that Court dated August 29, 1996; the said Steven J. Fishgold having been directed on January 22, 1997, to inform this Court of any claim he has that the imposition of the identical or comparable discipline in this Commonwealth would be unwarranted and the reasons therefor; and no response having been filed, it is
ORDERED that Steven J. Fishgold is suspended from the practice of law in this Commonwealth consistent -with the Order of the United States Bankruptcy Court for the Eastern District of Pennsylvania dated August 29, 1996, and he shall comply with all the provisions of Rule 217, Pa.R.D.E.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

casebody.head_matter:
693 A.2d 582
In the Matter of Steven J. FISHGOLD.
No. 299 Disciplinary Docket No. 3.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
March 20, 1997.
